请使用没有压缩过的代码，然后看下 slice 是什么对象上的方法，如果是 ECharts 的再告诉我们一下。如果是 vuecli3 相关的，请到相关项目下报错。

在更大的分辨率下复现了。

![1573182134(1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68446340-6037e280-0217-11ea-9b80-f88e98d53c96.jpg)
这张图的两条线  x轴的坐标只显示了对应的一条y轴的数值(下面那条) 但是上面那条并没显示,实际上它显示的也不是当前位置的数值 而是传入点data[x,y] (相邻的)  当鼠标在data[x,y]和data[x+1,y+1]之间时并没有数据 也就是说只能显示出传入点的值,两个传入点之间的数值显示不出来

This issue is labeled with `waiting-for: author`.
@edenluhongdeng Please give more information to get the help from the community, or close this issue if you think your problem has been fixed.
@Ovilia 实际上我是想让data[x,y]和data[x+1,y+1]之间的数据也能通过tooltip显示出来

Hi @headgreen 

In the `regions` property it should be `height` insteadof `regionHeight`
@eniaclyl About 1-2 months.

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

> So you want two axes on two sides, and they are the same?
> You can set `yAxis` to be an array of y axes and max value should be set to make sure they are the same. Then, hide `splitLine` of the right axis.

@Ovilia thanks for your quick reply!

I had previously tried something like this, but ran into problems with deviating values, as you mentioned. I thought that was because the min & max was automatically deducted from the series, but on second thought, I think I overlooked something.  I will try again and get back shortly...

希望能自定义方法来触发toolbox里面图标的事件，请问你有实现么 @curryhh

I can't seem to get it working. We are using "dataMin" and "dataMax" to set the scale of the y-axis, but when I duplicate the y-axis, the 2nd y-axis doesn't get rendered. I think it requires a 2nd series? (N.B. If I manually provide a min and max it does get rendered.)

Aside from that, I would say that it would be more robust and clean to just declare that you want the y-axis printed twice, rather than duplicating it manually.  Wouldn't you agree?

@pissang I noticed that you requested changes to the Azul theme (renamed a few elements, etc.) 

Most of the theme files need these changes, so I'm updating them now (local files). I'll update the files on GitHub when I'm done fixing them locally.

If you see any other lines of code in the themes that need to be changed, please let me know.

Thanks!
@pissang thanks , it's the error of doc.
我查了下这个bug，是zrender的问题，然后看到最新的zrender源代码已经修了这个问题，但是还没release，自己下最新的zrender自己build可以解决这个问题

I double checked and the call is proper, first the inclusion of echarts library via script tag and then the call to echarts is happening. Even I am not sure, why this is happening and that's why raised this ticket.

The issue I am trying to point out is, that browser loads the echarts.min.js file before there is a call to echarts.init() method. Then why it is throwing error on echarts variable not defined.
Do I have explicitly define the variable echarts ? and if yes, how to do so ? 

Kindly let me know if there is anything else to look.
Thanks for helping. Got the issue, closing it.
进展如何？
点击折线上的原点的时候是有事件的，预期的效果是什么？
You need an extra series binding to the second y axis and keep the two series and axes the same.

We are improving the ability of labeling, but I'm a afraid it won't be in the form of plugin.
Currently, it's hard to provide such plugin functions.
@wjdnlg 能再清楚地描述一下你的需求到底是什么吗？
You can use dataZoom and set a min/max value to y axis.
Please call `chart.resize` when the size of the DOM container is changed.
The example looks complicated. Could you please provide a minimum demo to reproduce this?

Aha! I thought I was the only one!!! #11517

@Ovilia 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68555241-a2576300-0467-11ea-9ac6-e6c54cddefc4.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68555361-5d7ffc00-0468-11ea-86e8-b5850c400e24.png)
当鼠标移到横坐标1时tooltip会显示test1和test2分别对应的数值,
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68555383-80aaab80-0468-11ea-9117-406c67301eea.png)
当鼠标移动到横坐标2时只显示了test2的值没有显示test1的值
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68555411-a3d55b00-0468-11ea-8035-284576ba2593.png)
当鼠标移动到2.5时只显示了test1的值没有显示test2的值
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68555442-c36c8380-0468-11ea-8afa-25eaa81124f9.png)
当鼠标移到3时test1和test2都显示

test1在横坐标为2时和test2在2.5时没有显示对应数值 (看第二第三张坐标图) 是因为data数组没有这个数值 (可以看看赋值的那张图片) ,我想的是既然这个折线图已经画出来了 只要知道横坐标  那他对应的纵坐标也应该显示出来  我这样说不知道明不明白  不明白我再补充
Thanks for reporting. This seems to be a bug.
Please set grid.left and right to be a large number.

Hi, @zyjwsg .
What do you mean by "zooming in window"?
[convertToPixel](https://echarts.apache.org/zh/api.html#echartsInstance.convertToPixel) 获得的结果符合预期吗？
`dispose` 之后需要 `chart = null` 然后重新 `chart = echarts.init(...)`

> 请问这个问题解决了吗？我在移动端使用时有类似问题，在图表外点击，但是tooltip一直存在（这个是偶然性发生的）

你可以试试在id容器上绑定一个`mouseleave`事件，在处理程序里面给canvas手动dispatch一个`mouseout`事件。

@Ovilia 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68557461-da16d880-0470-11ea-9952-bdb4fa891c4b.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68557508-04689600-0471-11ea-8c4a-495750c86700.png)
使用convertToPixel取到的像素坐标是一样的  即使test1没有(2,30)这一点  
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68557670-848efb80-0471-11ea-8d73-ae2f229fc60a.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53259799/68557981-90c78880-0472-11ea-9994-fd901da20931.png)


若果只传横坐标  test1和test2纵坐标都返回空 
如果能传横坐标,直接返回纵坐标就好了

> Hi, @zyjwsg .
> What do you mean by "zooming in window"?

Hi, @Ovilia .
it means some actions making window bigger, such as dragging to enlarge browser
like this gif:
![issue_echarts_11610](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7666606/68558679-2e23bc00-0475-11ea-9c64-9b894bad3ea1.gif)

> `dispose` 之后需要 `chart = null` 然后重新 `chart = echarts.init(...)`

修改了 还是报TypeError:null is not an object(evaluating 'this.ctx.dpr=this.dpr')
Hi, this is the strategy we adopted. I just want to know why you want the `source` and `target` is the same.

Hi, I've left the comments on the code.

Also the `min` `max` calculation is already in the https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/11617/files#diff-ed976f176ba3ed927f196407ddc456a0L68 . I think the fix should be in the function `numCalculate`. And there is no need to copy all the data out of the `List` module.
一般这种错误是 dispose 后继续使用 chart 实例造成的，@szkissyh 建议再排查一下，同时也可以整理一个可以最小复现的 demo 发给我们

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵
